Frequently Asked Questions

Absolutely! The frameworks and principles are designed to be valuable and applicable to real-world situations. However, always adapt them to your specific context and consult domain experts before implementing significant changes. This is a learning tool, not a prescription for action.

Yes, absolutely! With the disclaimer clearly displayed. This is educational material meant to be shared. Feel free to distribute the link or fork the repository (with proper attribution).

They're powered by real AI language models, which means they can be unpredictable and should not be trusted for factual information. They're designed to simulate realistic conversations for learning purposes. Treat them as interactive learning aids, not reliable sources of truth.

Fork the GitHub repository and modify the content to reflect your industry or organizational context. The framework is designed to be flexible. Just remember to clearly mark your version as a derivative work and maintain the educational disclaimer.

We don't collect personal data. However, GitHub (our hosting provider) may collect basic analytics about page visits and geographic data. See our Privacy Policy for complete details.

You can use the content and frameworks as part of educational training programs. However, you cannot commercialize or resell the RetailFlow brand/company itself. For specific questions about commercial use, check our Terms of Service.

RetailFlow was created by an instructor or training organization using AI-assisted development tools. Check the repository for full attribution and author information. See our Technology page for details on how this was built.

This site is fully responsive and works on mobile, tablet, and desktop devices. However, the crisis scenarios and training exercises are designed to be best experienced on a laptop or desktop for group discussion and projection.
